scripts.migration:run: docker exec ram-backend sh -c 'npx ts-node /app/node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:run --dataSource /app/src/orm/data-source.ts'
scripts.migration:revert: docker exec ram-backend sh -c 'npx ts-node /app/node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:revert --dataSource /app/src/orm/data-source.ts'
